summary: Shako follows you around, shouting insults.  You can either attack him for fun, or he\'ll follow you around attacking randomly things that attack you, if he decides to.
descriptionHtml:
On Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=77355514

Cicero\'s haunting memory of a Jester laughing ... did the jester he sent to Sithis actually die?

You feel a dark, evil, annoying presence growing close.  Shako the Demon Jester approaches you, calling you a noob.  When you try to kill him, he disappears, or runs away.  Sometimes he creates a clone of himself to fight along side him, trolling you all the way.  You can also have him follow you and fight along your side, all the while he sings of your noobiness.

He disappears when low on HP, and he casts hallucination, where you see ...double... look behind you...

Get your Shako today.  He\'s better then Cicero.
author: Hellcat5
